summary: This is a simple mod, i edited Jordis original face to my liking. this give her more knight looks
descriptionHtml:
Dark face bug : for u guys experiencing this, it is because conflict between XCE and your body mod, to solve this : don\'t use XCE, use only face texture compatible with your body mod.

This is a simple mod, i edited Jordis original face to my liking. this give her more knight looks (in my opinion of course). 
Please endorse if you like it!

INSTALLATION :
extract to your skyrim Data folder

IMPORTANT :
make sure the .esp load order is placed under any follower mod or you can place it at the bottom of all your mod. 
If you\'re using any face texture mod she may look different.

REQUIREMENT :
ApachiiSkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
(NOTE: ApachiiSkyHair for jordis hair already included in the mod, if you are not installing ApachiiSkyHair, i don\'t know if there will have bug or not)
If you want jordis just look like in my screenshot, i\'m using XCE mod

OPTIONAL :
If you want to make jordis using eisen armor like in my screenshot.. 
R18Pn 01 - Eisen Platte Armor for UNP CBBEv3 ReColor-STEEL by NPR - CluelessClue
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12534

Please inform me if you find any bug in this mod.

Check out my other mods :
Better Mjoll - Facelift
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19366
Aela and illia Facelift
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18297

Credit to : 
Foretrenty for his Skyrim NPC Editor the tool i used to make this mod.
Apachii for his awesome ApachiiSkyHair mod.
Xenius for his XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement mod.
NPR - CluelessClue for eisen armor and recollor version.

Hope you like it as i do!
author: leofj
